title: The World’s Only Veuve Clicquot Boutique Hotel with All-Inclusive Dining, Champagne & Celebrated Guest Chef Dinners
description:
Immerse yourself in Veuve Clicquot’s sun-loving ‘solaire’ lifestyle at the world's only Hotel Clicquot Australia, exclusive to Luxury Escapes. A visually striking boutique property with uninterrupted views of the ocean and private access to glorious Sunshine Beach and Noosa National Park, Hotel Clicquot Australia dazzles all the senses. From the instantly recognisable yellow-and-white-striped beach umbrellas lining the aquamarine swimming pool to the bursts of iconic Clicquot Yellow against the neutral colour palette of the interiors, the Solaire personality shines through at every turn.

During your once-in-a-lifetime, three-night experience, enjoy complimentary champagne and all-inclusive dining prepared by your private chefs, including two chef's table experiences with high-profile celebrity chefs. Savour an unforgettable afternoon onboard the chic mahogany Clicquot Dreamboat, where you'll be whisked away to enjoy an included beachside picnic, perfectly accompanied by a chilled bottle of Veuve Clicquot Brut Rosé. Enjoy that joyful Veuve Clicquot touch with a 24-hour private concierge and a resident sommelier, take a chauffeured ride into town to explore the boutiques of this fashionable resort town and sip Veuve Clicquot by the pool as the sun sets. Do as little or as much as you like during your stay, but rest assured you’ll be caught up in the joyful atmosphere of this singular luxury experience.

title: World First: Veuve Clicquot Byron Bay Boutique Hotel Experience for up to Six Adults with All-Inclusive Dining, Complimentary Champagne & Unforgettable Gastronomic Experiences with Two of Australia's Leading Chefs
description:
Experience one of the world's most hotly anticipated openings this year staying in champagne-soaked luxury within a fairytale setting at the world’s first Veuve Clicquot pop-up hotel: exclusive to Luxury Escapes. Nestled within an effortlessly cool Hamptons-inspired grand manor tucked amid five acres of Byron Bay's emerald hinterland, everything you need to eat, drink, relax and unwind in classic joie de vivre sophistication is at your doorstep during this two-night money can't buy escape. Here, you'll find pleasure in the signature Clicquot yellow design, the dedicated 24-hour butler service for up to six guests, a massage therapist to ensure rest and relaxation throughout and exclusive use of this property which boasts all the hallmarks of true luxury.

Every touchpoint has a classic Cliquot twist for an unforgettable stay, from the classic vintage cars for chauffeured day trips to the gastronomic dining experiences prepared by the renowned David Moyle and Alanna Sapwell. Sip glasses of complimentary Veuve Clicquot champagne by the glistening, heated infinity pool with canapés every afternoon, savour decadent meals handcrafted by a private on-demand chef in the fully equipped kitchen, treat yourself to a session in the sauna or stroll around the tropical grounds. You’ll also enjoy unlimited access to the hotel’s fully-staffed Bar Clicquot, featuring exclusive, rare champagne vintages and a daily calendar of unique, bespoke experiences, all of which are entirely optional. Celebrate the joy of the summer season and feel far away from the rest of the world in this verdant pocket of Byron Bay hinterland, arriving by luxury chauffeured car. This is your ticket to paradise, where you can slow down and spend time with friends - all just a 15-minute drive from Byron's world-famous coast.
